Articles.Content: I used some of the 1x6 panels for the first time in 1.0.2. No option to retract them once I had them extended...are they totally non-retractable now? Or are they only retractable with an Engineer? What about the other panels? Are they non-retractable now as well?

There are two models of 1\*6 and 2\*3 panels. One of them has no casing and lighter but not retractable while the other one has a protective casing + more temperature protection and is retractable yet heavier.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T14:15:10Z" title="06/01/2015 02:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by n0xiety**

As n0xiety said. 

Furthermore, the Gigantor solar panels are also retractable.
Yup found this out the hard way, on my duna Landing probe. Luckily the Atmo is thin and I had enough fuel to make my decent profile smooth and easy
Lesson learned: Make sure you read the part description. Each Solar Panel lets you know if it's non-retractable.
